BenefitSpecialty.name: BenefitSpecialty
BenefitSpecialty.description: Represents a junction between a benefit and a care specialty. The object maps the benefits provided to constituents with the specialties offered by the network of service providers.

BenefitId.description: The benefit associated with the benefit specialty record.

CareSpecialtyId.description: The care specialty associated with the benefit specialty record.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the benefit specialty.
